Not an official website of the United States government

Here’s how you know

Official websites use .gov
A .gov website belongs to an official government organization in the United States.

Secure .gov websites use HTTPS
A lock ( ) or https:// means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive information only on official, secure websites.

Design Tokens Test v0.0.0-10
  • Alert

Alert

Alerts (notices) are a way to highlight important information by separating it from the main copy.

Details

  • Extends: USWDS Alert component
  • Honeycrisp: Notice atom
  • Customization: Tokens and Styles
  • Modifier: .cfa-alert

The Alert extends the USWDS Alert component. The visual appearance is modified using design tokens applied to the USWDS Alert settings from the Honeycrisp Notice atom. Further styling is applied using the CSS modifier .cfa-alert to adds styles defined in a custom stylesheet.

Examples

Source

  • Package: @codeforamerica/design-tokens-test/packages/cfa-alert
  • Thymeleaf template: @codeforamerica/design-tokens-test/packages/cfa-alert/cfa-alert.th.html
  • ERB template: @codeforamerica/design-tokens-test/packages/cfa-alert/cfa-alert.erb
  • SCSS Stylesheet: @codeforamerica/design-tokens-test/packages/cfa-alert/_cfa-alert.scss
